description:
Stock of orders: Value index

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
44141 Stock of orders in the main construction industry

Definition:
The value index is a measure of the nominal development of
the stock of orders in the main construction industry.
The stock of orders is defined as the total value of all
construction contracts accepted and not yet completed in the
reference period.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Stock of orders: Value index
